channel.title: Bringing my KBD to life
channel.description:
Not much of a showoff but KBD was the first of it's kind. This was the first NPC to have emotions, feelings and be able to interact, some say that it could also feel love and compassion. It happened through a bug in the algorithm, somehow the KBD believed that it was human. Unfortunately it had to be put to rest as I was beginning to get harassed by thugs who wanted it gone, the world wasn't ready. This was a recording found in an old security cam that was setup in my office, this was the last conversation I had with KBD.
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3OQFnJu7rmw]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3OQFnJu7rmw[/url]
(On a serious note, this is just showing off a server bot. Sort of like cleverbot but for RSPS)

item.title: Bringing my KBD to life
item.dc:creator: @Motekiku Motekiku
item.description:
@Motekiku wrote:

Lmfao, that was a riot.
